snippet: The U.S. Consumer Financial Protection Bureau said on Friday it is increasing efforts within the agency to create a more diverse and fair work environment following concerns about discrimination....

headline.print_headline: U.S. Consumer Agency to Focus on Workplace Diversity, Fairness
headline.main: U.S. Consumer Agency to Focus on Workplace Diversity, Fairness

lead_paragraph: The U.S. Consumer Financial Protection Bureau said on Friday it is increasing efforts within the agency to create a more diverse and fair work environment following concerns about discrimination.
